entries.name: prerelease
entries.desc: When true, allows matching of requests to prerelease gems.

entries.name: remote
entries.desc: Set to true to disable network access for this set

entries.name: find_all(req)
entries.desc: The #find_all method must be implemented.  It returns all Resolver Specification objects matching the given DependencyRequest req.

entries.name: prefetch(reqs)
entries.desc: The prefetch method may be overridden, but this is not necessary.  This default implementation does nothing, which is suitable for sets where looking up a specification is cheap (such as installed gems).
